name: Bizenghast Video Game
blurb: When life ends, adventure begins!  In this haunting adventure RPG set within the world of the Bizenghast Graphic Novels.

rewards.reward: No Reward
Our sincerest gratitude and undying love for your support of our project.
A copy of the game for iOS or Android + a selection of special edition digital wallpapers for your mobile device.
A copy of the game for Mac, PC, or Linux + a selection of special edition digital wallpapers for your computer.

Early Bird Special!!! For the first 100 backers, you will recieve a digital edition eBook of the Bizenghast Graphic Novel Book #1 from Comixology. + Exclusive access to developer forums and inclusion on development team as a backer where you can take part in key decision making. + Name in credits. + Game for both mobile and computer platform of choice (iOS or Android) and (Mac, PC or Linux). + Special edition wallpapers for both mobile and computer.
